CourseQuery.html:
Course Overview

The Build User Login with PHP and MySQL course shows how to build User login and logout functionality with PHP and MySQL. In the course we are going to learn all required basics on how to work with PHP sessions in order to preserve a user authentication. After the course, you will be familiar with PDO MySQL driver and PDO classes that can be used for working with MySQL database.

For those who want to

  • Build PHP applications and don't know where to start
  • Learn how to work with MySQL database in PHP
  • Practice creating Login functionality in PHP
  • Familiarize with $_SESSION, $_GET and $_POST global PHP variables

What will you be able to do?

After course completion you will understand how the authentication mechanism works and what is required to build login and logout feature in PHP. Also, this course is a great start for developers and QA who want to start their journey with PHP language.

Are you ready to start your Mage Mastery journey?

Start with the first lesson where we are going to create a HTML login form and users table in a MySQL database. Follow the step-by-step lesson and build a complete user login feature in PHP. You will enjoy it!
